definitions: To remove something from a surface or a larger whole, often with fingers or a pointed tool.
To choose and gather ripe fruit or vegetables.
To provoke or start (a fight or argument).
To play a stringed instrument by plucking the strings.
examples: She will pick a dress for the party.
He likes to pick berries in the summer.
They tried to pick a fight with him.
He can pick out a tune on the guitar.
